original_text: You believe that there is only one God. That is good! But even the demons believe that! And it makes them very afraid.
korean_text: 네가 하나님은 한 분이신 줄을 믿느냐 잘하는도다 귀신들도 믿고 떠느니라

sentences.original_text: You believe that there is only one God.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 하나님께서 한 분만 계신다고 믿는다.

sentences.original_text: But even the demons believe that!
And it makes them very afraid.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 그들을 매우 두렵게 만든다.
